name: SKPhysicsContact
desc: A description of the contact between two physics bodies.

items.name: var bodyA: SKPhysicsBody
items.desc: The first body in the contact.

items.name: var bodyB: SKPhysicsBody
items.desc: The second body in the contact.

items.name: var contactPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The contact point between the two physics bodies, in scene coordinates.

items.name: var collisionImpulse: CGFloat
items.desc: The impulse that specifies how hard these two bodies struck each other in Newton-seconds.

items.name: var contactNormal: CGVector
items.desc: The normal vector specifying the direction of the collision.
